repository.name: nmap-stealth-smb-scanner
repository.description: Nmap Stealth SMB Scanner is a Python-based tool that runs a stealthy Nmap scan targeting Windows SMB and RPC ports. It uses advanced evasion techniques to help bypass basic intrusion detection and prevention systems (IDS/IPS). Ideal for red teamers, ethical hackers, or cybersecurity researchers in controlled environments.

development_potential.assessment: Limited integration potential. Lower community engagement but may have specific use cases. Consider for research or learning purposes.
